articles.author: Chris Scullion
articles.title: Starfield appears to have had the biggest Xbox Game Studios launch day yet | VGC - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: The game has been played by over six million players in its first 24 hours…
articles.content:
Starfield appears to have broken Microsoft‘s record for the biggest launch day for an Xbox Game Studios title.
When the game was released on Wednesday, Xbox boss Phil Spencer said it had exceeded on… [+1730 chars]
